name: Jim Power -The Lost Dimension
description: Special Agent Jim Power-The supernatural alien, Vaprak, threatens to defeat our world which is the last planet that stands between him and a dimensional vortex.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Intel Core 2 or Athlon 64 Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: All included versions are emulated.

reviews.review_text: A gold-tier handling of retro games, comes with each port of the title and a 'remastered' take. A lovely classic action game given new life in a literal three dimensions. Go for it!

Jim Power is a classic, hard as nails, action platform shooting title that retro gaming fans will enjoy way into the night. The recent trend of 'pixel' art style games are because of titles like Jim Power- while super detailed, the graphics are still able to hold up due to trends in gaming today. What is even cooler is, right now, you get three games with one purchase in this deal.  PC version- original title, full of challenge. SNES version- port of the PC title. SNES Enhanced version- Piko made some adjustments to the SNES original, reworked a few things and added little stuff here and there. All around, this is the version to play.  Doesn't matter which version you play though, if you want a quality challenge then play Jim Power.
